court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT
outcome: Heard learned counsel for the petitioner. 2. The court below is directed to dispose of the application seeking bail
full_text: BGR Teeter pea 2016/KER/69 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2016/14TH POUSHA, 1937 Cril.MC.No. 8063 of 2015 () LP.NO. 23/2012 (ST. NO.3593/2008) OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT -!, MUVATTUPUZHA. PETITIONER/ACCUSED: SANTHOSH. V.R., AGED 45 YEARS, S/O RAMANKUTTY, VAYALIL HOUSE, PERUMALLOOR KARA, MUVATTUPUZHA, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.GEO PAUL, SRLSANU MATHEW, SRILRADHIKA RAJASEKHARAN P., SRI.C.R.PRAMOD, SRILS.ASHOK KUMAR., SRI.LENIN P. SUKUMARAN. RESPONDENTS/COMPLAINANTI/STATE: 1. HYPSON ABRAHAM, S/O ABRAHAM, ALUMMOOTTIL HOUSE, PERUMBALLOOR, MUVATTUPUZHA, PIN-686 661. 2. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY S.I. OF POLICE, MUVATTUPUZHA POLICE STATION, MUVATTUPUZHA, BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682 031. R2 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.P. MAYA. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: rs. BGR Teeter pea 2016/KER/69 Crl.MC.No. 8063 of 2015 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES:- ANNEXURE A1: COPY OF THE B DIARY PROCEEDINGS IN L.P.NO.23/2012 (S.T.NO.3593/2008) ON THE FILES OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT I, MUVATTUPUZHA. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES:- NIL. /TTRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. Bl | CIR SPER re 2016/KER/69 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Cril.M.C. No.8063 of 2015 Dated this the 4" day of January, 2016 ORDER Heard learned counsel for the petitioner. 2. The court below is directed to dispose of the application seeking bail, if any filed by the petitioner, on his surrender before the court below within 10 days from today, preferably on the date of filing itself. Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/04/01 1/1 True Copy // PA to Judge
